Hawke’s Bay expressway fatal crash: A mother’s call for justice https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-expressway-fatal-crash-a-mothers-calls-for-justice/U4OTOJIYOJB5VJT2VVQV6LUB4I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-expressway-fatal-crash-a-mothers-calls-for-justice/U4OTOJIYOJB5VJT2VVQV6LUB4I/ Rafaella Melo'Somebody out there knows who caused this. A simple ride turned into a nightmare.' Wed, 22 Jan 2025 17:17:08 +0000 Three months after the car accident that led to the death of Napier’s Tyler Rea Tamatea, her family still seeks justice.
Toyota Aqua hatchback retains title for New Zealand’s most-stolen car in 2024 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/toyota-aqua-hatchback-retains-title-for-new-zeallands-most-stolen-car-in-2024/T2UEWKHWKZDZBDKIVGQ7FUSPLM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/toyota-aqua-hatchback-retains-title-for-new-zeallands-most-stolen-car-in-2024/T2UEWKHWKZDZBDKIVGQ7FUSPLM/ The Auckland region recorded the most vehicle thefts last year. Wed, 22 Jan 2025 16:00:00 +0000 AMI says the Toyota Aqua accounted for 8% of all stolen vehicle claims in 2024.
